formulas.name: DescriptionMessageFormule2
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!DescriptionOS}),{!DescriptionValidationOS}, "The following fields are inconsistent with the Zip Code: " & {!DescriptionOS}& {!DescriptionValidationOS})

formulas.name: DescriptionMessageFormule_0
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!DescriptionODGS}),{!DescriptionValidationODGS}, "The following fields are inconsistent with the Zip Code: " & {!DescriptionODGS} &{!DescriptionValidationODGS})

formulas.name: FX_TaxId
formulas.expression: IF( OR( ISBLANK({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}), LEN({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}) = 0 ), FALSE, AND( MOD( MOD( 11 - MOD( VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 1, 1)) * 10 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 2, 1)) * 9 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 3, 1)) * 8 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 5, 1)) * 7 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 6, 1)) * 6 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 7, 1)) * 5 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 9, 1)) * 4 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 10, 1)) * 3 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 11, 1)) * 2, 11 ), 11 ), 10 ) = VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 13, 1)), MOD( MOD( 11 - MOD( VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 1, 1)) * 11 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 2, 1)) * 10 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 3, 1)) * 9 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 5, 1)) * 8 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 6, 1)) * 7 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 7, 1)) * 6 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 9, 1)) * 5 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 10, 1)) * 4 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 11, 1)) * 3 + VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 13, 1)) * 2, 11 ), 11 ), 10 ) = VALUE(MID({!Get_Order_Delivery_Group_Summary.RI_TAX_ID__c}, 14, 1)) ) )

formulas.name: ODGS_Formula
OS_Formula
